alert.note: Alert for Dent (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Dent County through 815 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Salem, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bunker, Boss, Stone Hill and Howes Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
